biological_validations.name: Phylogenetic Tree
biological_validations.description: SNP-based phylogenetic tree of S. suis strains
biological_validations.interpretation: Tree represents evolutionary relationships based on core genome SNPs.

biological_validations.name: Phylogenetic Distances
biological_validations.interpretation: Larger distances indicate more divergent strains. Clustering of distances may indicate population structure.

biological_validations.name: AMR Gene Prevalence
biological_validations.description: Prevalence of AMR genes across strains
biological_validations.interpretation: High prevalence genes may be core resistance determinants or located on successful mobile elements.

biological_validations.name: Gene Correlation
biological_validations.interpretation: Strong positive correlation suggests co-selection or genetic linkage. Negative correlation may indicate functional redundancy.

biological_validations.name: Phylogenetic Signal
biological_validations.description: Matching between phylogenetic tree and trait data
biological_validations.result: 91 strains with both tree and trait data
biological_validations.interpretation: Phylogenetic signal analysis requires matching strain identifiers between tree and trait data.

biological_validations.name: AMR Gene Richness
biological_validations.description: Number of AMR genes per strain
biological_validations.interpretation: Higher richness indicates more extensive resistance profiles. Variation suggests diverse selection pressures.

biological_validations.name: Beta Diversity
biological_validations.description: Average Jaccard distance between strain AMR profiles
biological_validations.interpretation: Higher values indicate more diverse AMR profiles. Lower values suggest homogeneous population.

biological_validations.name: Trait Evolution Potential
biological_validations.description: Traits with sufficient variability for evolutionary analysis
biological_validations.interpretation: Variable traits can be analyzed for phylogenetic signal and evolution rate.
